e_shadowlands = {
	color={ 122 39 99 }
	color2={ 255 255 20 }
	
	capital = 98 # c_shadowlands
	culture = shadowlands
	
	k_shadowlands = {
		color={ 112 49 94 }
		color2={ 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = 98 # c_shadowlands
		culture = shadowlands
		
		d_shadowlands = {
			color={ 92 69 84 }
			color2={ 255 255 255 }
			
			allow = {
				OR = {
					lower_tier_than = KING
					any_demesne_province = { OR = { province_id = 98 } }
				}
			}
			capital = 98 # c_shadowlands
			
			c_shadowlands = { # 98
				color={ 82 79 79 }
				color2={ 255 255 255 }
				
				b_festering_pit = {
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
